Package com.kontakt.sdk.ble.configuration

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeaconActivityCheckConfiguration
    Beacon Activity Check configuration describes the time boundary after which the beacon device is interpreted as absent and than is removed from internal cache.
    ConfigurationValidator
    ConfigurationValidator checks ServiceConnector's configuration parameters and validates if they don't match expected requirements.
    ForceScanConfiguration
    According to the bug no 65863 reported at Android Open Source Project some Android devices perform single scan for each BLE device found.
    MonitorPeriod
    Monitor period describes time of single period while device monitoring.
    ScanScope
    The type Scan scope.
    ScanScope.Builder
    The type Builder.
